name: Frail Hearts: Versicorae Domlion
summary:
Lovecraft-inspired mix of a visual novel and JRPG

Frail Hearts: Versicorae Domlion is a mystery story about troubled souls placed in a dark city of Gris. Being completely different people, they have their own burdens to overcome in order to be able to see the greater picture and play their part in this tragedy. The gangster, the nun, scholar, and a bookworm: how could they be connected when they never even met once? Just pull one string and see the whole web coming into motion.
